```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
raw_df <- 
  here("data_in", "preseason_projections.csv") %>% 
  read_csv() %>% 
  clean_names()
```

```{r}
plot <- 
  raw_df %>% 
  dplyr::filter(division != 'NL East') %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=division, y=points, color=division)) +
  geom_jitter(aes(label=team))

ggplotly(plot)
```
